name: banking-app
description: DittoPay is a small Android app that corresponds with the sample project in your workspace.

scripts.ditto:pull: npx @dittowords/cli pull && cp ditto/components__sample-components__base.xml app/src/main/res/values/strings.xml && cp ditto/components__sample-components__portuguese---br-sample.xml app/src/main/res/values-pt/strings.xml
